tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  RESPECTED  BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES
comments: Mr. Fresco was amazing for Bio 101 lecture/lab. He had a good sense of humor and did everything and anything for us to succeed throughout the term. He also somehow made sure that the entire class was really comfortable with each other, which helps out when you\'re in the lab setting. I would have to say he\'s my second favorite teacher at trident!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: Mr. Fresco was HANDS DOWN the best teacher I\'ve ever had in a science class! I used to hate biology when I took it in high school. But he has made me love it so much now that I changed my major to it. He genuinely cares for his students and understands that sometimes you have stuff going on outside of school. Such a great person and teacher!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I recommended that any and everyone get this professor if you are taking biology. He is amazing and very helpful. His teaching is crystal clear and his passion for this subject is out of this world. I hope Trident and the world get more professors like him. He understands, he gets it!!!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: The best! Vector breaks it down perfectly. his test comes from HIS notes but everything he teaches off his notes are on the final. He teaches his labs. The only down fall is that he only teaches at night 6 until 10 lab nights but we only stayed til ten maybe like five time if not less but he is AWESOME!!!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: GREAT teacher! willing to help and always on time. study your notes and the tests from the book and you won\'t fail!!!

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Such a genuinely good guy. Very good teacher but definitely doesn\'t let you slide by. He actually wants you to learn and love the material. You get what you put in so if you don\'t study and you don\'t go to class, you surely wont pass. However, if something comes up he is always willing to work with you. one of my favorite teachers! Actually teaches

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I thought he was definitely a great professor! He has a love for biology and he makes you love it to. As long as you study the powerpoints that he posts online, you will do well. I highly recommend him, I am just sad he doesn\'t teach Bio102 or any other classes.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Prof Fresco does everything he can to make sure you understand the material and pass the class. The test he gives are difficult as are the quizzes but if you study you will do well and he is always willing to give you extra help when you need it.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I had to re-take this class because my previous credit was too old. I went in with a bad attitude but he was so motivating and positive he changed my attitude around. I learned a lot more from him then the first time I took the course. He prepared us so well for the final I made an A without studying.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This professor will dedicate every minute of his time to assure you have gotten the material and understand it. He encouraged me to go on and get my 4 year degree in biology even though my intention was nursing. He doesn\'t like abscences but understands and makes you find other means if you miss class and there aren\'t makeup quizes.

tag_professor: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very interesting class. Sometimes the material is hard to understand, but he will devote time to help you if you ask. Very knowledgable about biology. One of the best professors i\'ve ever had.
